name: Nazo Waku Yakata: Oto no Ma ni Ma ni
name_original: Nazo Waku Yakata: Oto no Ma ni Ma ni
description:
Nazo Waku Yakata: Oto no Ma ni Ma ni is an arcade game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2011. Nintendo published the game.
You can play Nazo Waku Yakata: Oto no Ma ni Ma ni on Nintendo 3DS.
